wizard.description: Export a Ceylon module to a module repository.

wizard.description: Export a Java archive to a module repository.

Collapse Imports
command.description: Collapses import list in the current source file

command.name: Collapse Comments
command.description: Collapses all multi-line comments in the current source file
Comments/uncomments the current selection or the current source line
command.name: Toggle Comment
Go to Matching Fence
command.description: Moves the cursor to the matching fence character, if any
Terminate the statement at the current line and close brackets
command.name: Terminate Statement

command.description: Format the statements in the enclosing block
command.name: Format Block

command.description: Select the innermost enclosing word or construct
command.name: Expand Selection

copyParticipant.name: Copy package participant for Ceylon source
Copy file participant for Ceylon source

moveParticipant.name: Move file participant for Ceylon source

commonFilter.name: Empty Ceylon parent packages
commonFilter.description: Hides empty packages which do not contain files but other sub-folders. E.g. given a package 'org.junit' where 'org' does not contain any files, this filter will hide the package 'org' but not the package 'org.junit'

commonFilter.name: Empty Ceylon module repositories
commonFilter.description: Hides Ceylon module repositories that doesn't contain any module used by the project

commonFilter.name: Ceyon output repository folder
commonFilter.description: Hides the folder used as the Ceylon output repository
